title: Echoes of the Soul
lyrics:
Echoes of the soul, calling to the Divine,
In silence and in whispers, our hearts align.
meanings: The song reflects the inner yearning of the heart to connect with the Divine presence in moments of stillness and reflection.

title: Divine Melody
meanings: An instrumental piece meant to evoke peace and serenity, symbolizing the harmony found in divine order.

title: In the Light of Faith
lyrics:
In the light of faith we stand tall,
Guided by truth, answering the call.
meanings: This nasheed emphasizes the strength and clarity one finds when living with firm belief and purpose.

title: Whispers of Tradition
lyrics:
Whispers of old, tales of grace,
Stories etched in time and place.
meanings: A tribute to cultural roots and the wisdom passed down through generations.

title: Hearts in Prayer
lyrics:
Hearts in prayer, hands raised high,
Seeking mercy from the sky.
meanings: This track reflects on the intimate act of turning to God in prayer, hope, and submission.

title: Serenity in Sound
meanings: A calm ambient piece designed to promote mindfulness and inner tranquility.
